data.eml:eml: Taxonomic Review of Eumenes Latreille, 1802 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Eumeninae) from the New World

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grandinete, Yuri Campanholo, Noll, Fernando Barbosa, Carpenter, James (2018): Taxonomic Review of Eumenes Latreille, 1802 (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Eumeninae) from the New World. Zootaxa 4459 (1): 1-52, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4459.1.1
